screen_desc: This screenshot shows the home screen of a smartphone with a grid layout displaying various app icons, including Chrome, Calendar, Photos, and Settings. The Google search bar is at the top, and the time is displayed in the top left corner.
action_think: The user wants to uninstall the 'DoorDash - Food Delivery' app. I need to find the app in the app drawer and then select it to initiate the uninstallation process.
action_plan: Scroll up to find the app among the available apps
Select the app to open the app information page
action_result: Clicking on the Google Play Store app has taken us back to the home screen, where I can now find and uninstall "DoorDash - Food Delivery". This action is necessary to remove the app from the device.
